rComments: Nice guy and very intelligent, but difficult to understand. Fair tests but of course there is always a curve. He is a fair guy overall, but study and hard work is necessary for this class. Lastly, HORRIBLE textbook (Fundamentals of Microelectronics)

Although the midterm average is low, EVERYTHING IS CURVED. He was extremely helpful when you ask questions at office hours. A little hard to follow during lecture however. Overall if you do consistenly well on the homework, and the quizzes, you can pass this class. I sure did.

Arrogant, incomprehensible, rude professor. He responds to questions by answering something completely unrelated. His midterm 1 had an average of 58/100. He pushes stuff off (what's going to be on the final Wentai? everything?), calls students slow, and can't stick to one convention (is it positive to negative or vice versa?) Take Joel or Ken.
